channel.title: [SOLVED] Why does this code crash my client?
channel.description:
I'm attempting to add a set of bronze armor to the player's when they click a bronze statue. The code I am using is crashing the client when I click the statue.
[code] if(objectID == 7305){ addItem(1075, 1);//bronze platelegs addItem(1117, 1);//bronze platebody addItem(1155, 1);//bronze full helm addItem(1189, 1);//bronze kiteshield } [/code]
Thanks.

item.title: [SOLVED] Why does this code crash my client?
item.dc:creator: @ahaydon ahaydon
item.description:
@ahaydon wrote:

Fixed it. Had to do some file overwriting from my backup folder, but it’s working now.

Read full topic

Try using an else-if train or switch statement instead of just multiple if’s

item.title: [SOLVED] Why does this code crash my client?
item.dc:creator: @ahaydon ahaydon
item.description:
@ahaydon wrote:

I don’t get it…

This code works:

	if(objectID == 4463){
	addItem(2436, 1);
	addItem(2440, 1);
	addItem(2442, 1);
	}

Why doesn’t the other work?

item.title: [SOLVED] Why does this code crash my client?
item.dc:creator: @ahaydon ahaydon
item.description:
@ahaydon wrote:

I’m attempting to add a set of bronze armor to the player’s when they click a bronze statue. The code I am using is crashing the client when I click the statue.

if(objectID == 7305){
	addItem(1075, 1);//bronze platelegs
	addItem(1117, 1);//bronze platebody
	addItem(1155, 1);//bronze full helm
	addItem(1189, 1);//bronze kiteshield
}

Thanks.

Read full topic
